name: Katheryne
description: When you perform "Switch Character": This switch is considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. (Once per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character":</color> This switch is considered a $[K2] instead of a $[K1]. (Once per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character":</color> This switch is considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>. (Once per Round)
storytext: "Ad astra abyssosque! Welcome to the Adventurers' Guild."
source: Reward for accepting Lan's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
